meanings.definition: The act of adding color to a black and white image.
meanings.sent1: The colorizations of the old photographs brought them to life.
meanings.sent2: I love looking at colorizations of classic movies.
meanings.sent3: The artist's colorizations of historical figures made them look like they belonged in the present day.
meanings.sent4: Her colorizations were like a rainbow bursting out of a black and white world.
meanings.sent5: The colorizations in the art exhibit were so vibrant and eye-catching.
